video_caption: The video begins with a young man and woman in a kitchen, the man playfully hugging the woman from behind as they both smile. The scene transitions to a close-up of the woman with long blonde hair, wearing a denim jacket, speaking directly to the camera. The next frame shows a young man in a black hoodie, also speaking to the camera, with a poster of a space scene in the background. The video then cuts to a close-up of a glass of tea being poured, with the text "it's trashy tea" overlaid in pink, accompanied by heart and cross symbols. The narrative continues with a woman with blonde hair speaking in a room with a wooden ceiling, followed by a scene of two people in a car during a thunderstorm, with the text "it's trashy tea" again overlaid. The video then shows a woman with blonde hair laughing in a pool at night, with the same text overlay. The final scene features the young man and woman sitting on a couch, the man in a colorful jacket and the woman in a black top and leopard print skirt, with the text "it's trashy tea" still present. Throughout the video, the atmosphere is casual and intimate, with a focus on personal interactions and candid moments.

The video features a split-screen format with a dramatic lightning storm on the left and a cozy indoor setting on the right. The text "it's trashy tea" appears in pink at the top right corner, suggesting a casual, informal discussion or vlog. In the indoor scene, two individuals are present, with one person in the foreground displaying a range of expressions and gestures, including raising their hand and moving closer to the camera. The background reveals a room with a shelf holding various items, a patterned curtain, and a teal and white striped wall, creating a homely atmosphere. The storm outside contrasts sharply with the calm interior, emphasizing the difference between the two settings. The video maintains a consistent theme of juxtaposing the intensity of the storm with the relaxed, intimate environment inside.

The video begins with a person with long hair indoors, with a lightning storm visible through a window, accompanied by the text 'it's trashy tea' in pink letters. The scene transitions to a close-up of the same person, with the storm still visible, and the text 'Then Olivia shook everyone when she shared a fanmade clips along with captions that pretty clear she ended relationship with Kio.' The next frame shows a person wearing a red cap, with the text 'So just like that???' The video then shifts to a pixelated image of a person in a room, with the text 'Fans addressed that she's just using Kio for clout and fame...' followed by a screenshot of a comment from 'Orzulya' stating, 'I'm afraid she has just used Kio to become more popular and gain helpful acquaintances,' with 4703 likes. The final frame shows a group of people sitting on a railing by the sea, dressed casually in jeans and t-shirts, with the text 'it's trashy tea' in pink letters. The video appears to discuss a controversy involving Olivia and Kio, with fans expressing their opinions on social media.

The video features a person with long blonde hair, wearing a blue top with a heart pattern, speaking directly to the camera in a room with a red couch and a yellow wall in the background. The atmosphere is dramatic, with a stormy sky and lightning visible on the left side of the screen, while the right side shows a dark, cloudy sky. Throughout the video, the text "it's trashy tea" appears at the top of the screen in a playful font, indicating a casual and possibly humorous tone. The person is surrounded by various comments from viewers, displayed in a chat format at the bottom of the screen. These comments include messages like "I thought ur voice would be higher haha," "I LOVE YOU," and "YOU ARE SO BEAUTIFUL, I LOVE YOU SO MUCH ❤️❤️❤️," among others, reflecting a mix of admiration, humor, and personal interaction. The person's expressions and gestures suggest they are engaging with the audience, possibly discussing or reacting to the comments. The overall setting and visual elements create a dynamic and interactive environment, blending personal commentary with a dramatic backdrop.

The video features a person with long blonde hair, wearing a blue hoodie with white polka dots, sitting indoors in a room with a red couch and a yellow lamp in the background. The atmosphere is dramatic, with a stormy sky and lightning visible through a window on the left side of the frame. The text "it's trashy tea" is displayed in pink at the top right corner, suggesting a casual, gossip-like theme. Throughout the video, various comments from viewers appear on the screen, including messages like "hi Dianna come in the live," "I love you a lot seriously you are my inspiration," and "are you and kio friends?" These comments indicate an interactive session, possibly a live stream, where viewers are engaging with the person. The person reacts to the comments, occasionally moving their head and gesturing with their hands, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The video maintains a consistent setting and theme, with the stormy background and the person's casual attire contributing to a relaxed yet engaging atmosphere.

The video begins with a person with long blonde hair, wearing a blue top, speaking directly to the camera in a room with a red couch and a yellow wall in the background. The text "it's trashy tea" is displayed in pink at the top right corner, indicating a casual, gossip-like theme. The left side of the frame shows a dramatic lightning strike against a dark sky, while the right side features a stormy sky with dark clouds, adding a sense of intensity to the scene. The person gestures with their hands and occasionally touches their face, engaging with the audience. The video then transitions to a close-up of another individual with short hair, wearing a white headscarf and a white top, standing in front of a backdrop with flowers and a purple curtain, suggesting a different setting. The text "it's trashy tea" remains consistent throughout. The scene shifts back to the blonde-haired person, now in a different room with a poster on the wall behind them, still wearing the blue top. The lightning and stormy sky visuals persist on the sides of the frame. The video then features a person with short brown hair, wearing a black hoodie over a light blue shirt, speaking directly to the camera in a room with a poster of a space scene on the wall. The text "it's trashy tea" continues to be displayed, maintaining the theme. The video concludes with the same person in the black hoodie, with the lightning and stormy sky visuals still present, creating a cohesive and dramatic atmosphere throughout the video.

The video features a person wearing a black hoodie and a light blue shirt, standing indoors with a background that includes a framed picture on the wall. The text 'it's trashy tea' appears in pink at the top right corner of the screen, suggesting a casual or informal discussion. The scene transitions to a stormy outdoor setting with dark clouds and lightning, creating a dramatic atmosphere. The video then shifts to a blurred image of a person with text overlaying the image, stating 'People are making assumptions that she dropped him after falling for new rising tiktoker Noah Beck.' This text implies speculation about a relationship breakup involving a TikTok influencer named Noah Beck. The video continues with another blurred image of a person, accompanied by the text 'Is Noah the reasons why?!' in bold letters, further emphasizing the speculation about Noah Beck's role in the situation. The overall theme of the video appears to revolve around gossip or speculation about relationships and social media influencers.

The video begins with a split-screen image featuring a lightning storm on the left and a cloudy sky on the right, with the text 'it's trashy tea' in pink at the top. In the center, two individuals are seen indoors, with one wearing a blue shirt and the other in a dark shirt. Notifications from 'etm0506' and 'jamiesell...' appear, indicating they sent TikTok videos. The scene transitions to a tweet from 'Kio Cyr' (@kio_cyr) dated 6/28/20, expressing concern about people attacking Olivia, describing her as pure and kindhearted. The video then shows two individuals outdoors, one in a dark shirt with a necklace and the other in a colorful dress, with text questioning Olivia's motives. The next scene features two individuals lounging on a bed, one shirtless and the other in a red top, with the text 'Thoughts about them?' displayed. The video concludes with a promotional screen encouraging viewers to follow on Instagram, tweet on Twitter, and subscribe on YouTube, with the handles 'ITSMOVIESHOW' and 'OSNAPPITZME' visible.
